track.name: Bad Card
comments: One of my favorites from Brother Bob.

I want to disturb my neighbour, 
'cause I'm feelin' so right.
I want to turn up my disco, 
blow them to full watts tonight, eh! - PERFECTLY describes how this album, and good music in general, makes me feel. Big up to Brother Bob.
"...I let no man drag me down so low as to make me hate him..." -- Booker T.  Washington

maby is this my way of promotion but when you guy's hear it you will understand why I'm pushing my stuf like this it will be also in the shops and by the internet I'm sorry for this way of promotion. The first time I listened to Uprising, I had just learnt to ride a bike, afterwards I rode it so fast and crashed onto a barbed wire fence. I still bear the scar, hence the remebrance
